title: Hello, I have a Pixel XL, after doing the update of the Android Pie, my phone got damaged,
content: The cell phone is turned on by itself.after I did the actualization to Android Pie. The cel restarting Again and again .. I took it to a place called, ubreakifix, but they could not do anything .. My brother enter safe in safe mode, but it turns out that the phone is blocked.  What I can do.?
